name: get_analysis
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool similar_web.
Tool description: This API helps you to query website traffic and key metrics for any website, including engagement rate, traffic ranking, keyword ranking and traffic source... to create a plugin like similarweb.com
API description: Get website traffic, key metrics, including engagement rate, traffic ranking, keyword ranking and traffic source.

domain.description: Any site or domain that you are familiar with. Ex : amazon.com
